Text: Thanks for the upload armadillo ! It works flawlessly.

Working good until you start to make your own PCB footprint libraries. Everything messes up - sometimes it loads the library, sometimes it doesn't, sometimes it loads it without your footprints. And yes, I'm talking about handmade footprints and handmade libraries.
Other than that, seems to be working fine. This bug was driving me insane, so I downloaded the regular S09 version, installed it  and cracked it - everything is ok now. I followed instructions from this page to crack the program, since the instructions included with the crack are very, very bad.
New version: Altium Designer Summer 09 Build 9.4.0.20159, Portable Edition: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6036709/Altium_Designer_Summer_09_Build_9.4.0.20159_Portable.rar
